results.title: Angel baby
results.creator_credit: Michael Rymer, Jonathan Shteinman, Timothy White, Meridian Films and Stamen
results.brief_description: A funny, haunting love story, this film tells the story of two lost souls, Harry and Kate who fall in love against the odds and find the hope and strength in each other to accomplish the impossible. Jacqueline McKenzie and John Lynch star as two people with psychological problems who must also overcome many obstacles on the path to happiness, not the least of which is the pre-conceived notions of other people. Full of humour, compassion and hope this is a testament to the power of love; a roller coaster journey to the magical fringes of the human psyche.

results.title: Shallow grave
results.creator_credit: Danny Boyle, Andrew Macdonald, Channel 4, Figment Films and Glascow Film Office
results.brief_description: What would you do if your new roommate mysteriously dies, leaving an open suitcase full of money? This is the situation that faces three young professionals (Kerry Fox, Christopher Eccleston and Ewan McGregor) when they take in a new border after stringently screening for a successful applicant. It seems an easy choice to make but when they decide to keep the money it changes their lives and relationships between each other irrevocably. Produced by the creators of “Trainspotting” this black comedy won best acting awards for the three lead performers at the British International Film Festival.

results.title: Dementia 13
results.creator_credit: Francis Ford Coppola, Roger Corman and American International Pictures (AIP)
results.brief_description: This gory shlock-horror film (Coppola’s first commercial feature) follows the plight of a greedy woman, Louise Haloran (Luana Anders), whose husband dies of a heart attack. Ms Haloran’s plan is to pretend her husband is still alive to keep the fortune he’s soon to inherit from his crazed, dying mother (Ethne Dunn). What follows is a series of bizarre and grisly murders. Written and directed by Coppola and made with a budget of a mere $22,000.

results.title: Look who's laughing
results.brief_description: Lucille Ball adds her own brand of zaniness to a fast-paced comedy starring some of the great names from the Golden Age of radio. Fibber McGee is the center of a lot of commotion when he tries to lure an aircraft factory into the vicinity of Wistful Vista. True to his style however, he does so through a series of hair-brained schemes. Fibber manages to enlist the likes of ventriloquist Edgar Bergen and his wise-cracking sidekick Charlie McCarthy to help complete the factory deal, with assistance from a certain red-headed sectretary.

results.title: Farewell Moscow
results.creator_credit: Mauro Bolognini, Enrico Roseo and Radiotelevisione Italiana
results.brief_description: Ida Nudel, played by Liv Ullmann in one of the finest performances of her career, is a Russian scientist, a violinist and a Jew. She dearly loves her sister Elena, and Juli, a young poet interned as a dissident. She loves the synagogue, she even loves her ex-husband. But most of all she loves Russia, and does not want to leave. As the Jewish persecutions grow more violent she finally decides the time has come to leave Russia, for her personal safety. Through all her trials and tribulations her old spirit remains unbroken and she becomes an inspiration to a whole generation of Russian Jews.

results.title: The Inquiry
results.creator_credit: Damiano Damiani, Clesi Cinematografica and Italian International Film
results.brief_description: The Roman Emperor Tiberius, living in paranoid isolation on the island of Capri, instructs is lieutenant Taurus to go to Palestine and find the missing body of Jesus of Nazareth who was crucified three years earlier. The word is out that Jesus has risen from the dead and Tiberius is both adamant to dispel potentially dangerous rumours and discover the truth for himself. The arrival of the Emperor’s inquistor throws the local authorities into alarm since it appears that everyone in the township has a reason to fear abd something to hide, especially the local governor Pontius Pilate. What is the truth behind the mysterious disappearance of the corpse of Jesus? Starring Keith Carradine and Harvey Keitel.

results.title: Contempt = Le Mepris
results.creator_credit: Jean-Luc Godard, Carlo Ponti, Georges de Beauregard, C C Champion (Rome), Concordia and Rome Paris Films
results.brief_description: When aspiring playwright Paul Javal (Michel Piccoli) is called in as script doctor on a film of The Odyssey, he is caught between a director (Fritz Lang) who wants to capture the reality of Homer’s world, and crass producer Prokosch (Jack Palance) who just wants more mermaids. As his artistic integrity gradually succumbs to the power of Prakosch’s chequebook, his wife Camille (Bardot) regards him with increasing contempt. This video includes the original cinema trailer.

results.title: One plus one
results.creator_credit: Jean-Luc Godard, Iain Quarrier, Michael Pearson and Cupid Productions Ltd
results.brief_description: In this film Godard appears fascinated less by the Rolling Stones’ rebel-rock image (the Stone-as-product) than he is with their process of composition. Through its hovering concentration, the camera tracking and panning acrosss each member of the band, this emerges as one of the most detailed, revealing rock documentaries ever made. The film is a collage of the Rolling Stones rehearsing the song “Sympathy with the Devil”, Black Power revolutionaries and a TV interview with one Eve Democracy, is a key film from the period following the ‘68 uprising when there was ‘something in the air’ and stands as a model of political film-making during changing times.

results.title: Oh, Serafina!
results.brief_description: Augusto’s best friends are the birds that he talks to in the park while seeking refuge from his crazy and constantly arguing parents. After his father kills himself by jumping off the local bell-tower, Augusto reluctantly takes over the management of his family’s Mother-of-Pearl button factory, which in accordance with his own ecological beliefs, he refuses to industrialize. In his new workplace he is seduced by the ambitious Palmira, who he eventually marries, and who has him committed to a lunatic asylum where he meets the woman of his dreams, the ecologically-minded Serafina. In Italian language with no English subtitles.

results.title: On a moonlit night
results.creator_credit: Lina Wertmüller, Fulvio Lucisano, Carthago Films, Istituto Luce, Italian International Film and Raidue
results.brief_description: John Knot is a man of the world and a lover of freedom and adventure. After years of reporting on wars, he devotes himself to reporting on the “plague of the century”, AIDS. Years ago while working together in Lebanon, John and Massimo, a young Italian photographer, met a woman photographer, Joelle. She and John had an affair and then suddenly one day she disappeared. Whilst travelling the world with Masimo, pretending to be HIV positive in order to record reactions from different people, he meets Joelle again in a Paris newspaper office. They make a vow never to separate again, but fate has other plans for them. Starring Rutger Hauer, Natassja Kinski, Faye Dunaway, Peter O’Toole and Lorraine Bracco. Costumes designed by Gianni Versace.
